title: Hla taka mi thim Pathian thu awih lote
lyrics:
Hla taka mi thim, Pathian thu awih lote,
thlaray chhiar sen loh an boral mek e;
Tute nge kal ang chhandamna thu hrilhin,
Isua lam ena eng pawh huam zelin.

"Ka hnenah thuneih pek a ni,
Ka hnenah thuneih pek a ni;
Ram tinah kal ulangin Chanchin tha thu hril turin,
Ka tel zel ang," a ti.

En teh, khawvel mi'n kawng hawngin an ko che,
Krista sipaite u, thovin lut r'u;
Kristiante u, harh ula, theihtawp chhuah r'u,
Chanchin Tha hril, sual khaidiat tichatin.

"Engah nge i harh loh," Pathianin a ti,
Ngui lovin a hmingin lo harh thuai rawh;
Thihna hlauhawm hneh turin Isua a thi,
"Nun leh chhandamna,
" tiin au vel rawh.
